    • generateCandidate

      abstract BalanceAction generateCandidate(BalancerClusterState cluster, boolean isWeighing)
      Generates a balancing action to appease the conditional.
      Parameters:
      cluster - Current state of the cluster.
      isWeighing - Flag indicating if the generator is being used for weighing.
      Returns:
      A BalanceAction, or NULL_ACTION if no action is needed.
